Hi, I’m Maeva 🌸

I’m a product designer of 4+ years of experience, based in France.

I thrive to create minimal experiences for users and organized journeys for people who work with me. I’m fairly interested in humans, Design System, Open-Source, accessibility, and learning new skills.
